What is your overall assessment of this course
What is your overall rating of the primary instructor
The primary instructor's provided students with helpful and timely feedback
The instructor established a positive learning environment

Comments_Questions: Indicate the total number of hours per week (outside the classroom) you spent on this course
Looking back on this course, what is your overall assessment of the course:  What are its strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might it be improved

How would you summarize this course for a fellow student?  Would you recommend it to another student?  Why or why not
Comments_List: 8-10 hours. I don't know. This course is so hard.

The course provides theoretical basis of survival analysis, it is useful ,but it is also very difficult to understand. The notations in slides and textbook are different, probably they could be changed to the same, and slides could include more details.
Great course for learning fundamental theory of survival analysis.
This course focused more on theoretical basis of survival data analysis. Sometimes it's demanding for you to understand the materials.
recommended if you are in a biostats program and want to refresh yourself about some theoretical stats

The course is extremely difficult and theoretical. I think it required a solid background in statistical theories to begin with. It might be better if Dr. Ma could make it very clear about the expectation on each part of the material. For example, which part requires a solid understanding and you should be able to derive that by yourself.
Great! I learned a lot of things.
He is humorous and very nice, and he always talks jokes in class. But it would be better if he posts homework related to exams.
He was good at illustrating theoretic concepts by simple examples. But his handwritings on the blackboard could be cleaner and tidier.
Dr. Ma introduced many theories behind the methods, but often times it's in an intuitive way. I hope more detailed information can be provided.
Humorous, have high standard for us, could be maybe a little bit more organized in the teaching content
Dr. Ma is very responsive and approachable. For a torturing course, he is still a great instructor!
The course is a little bit hard to learn, but it is helpful if you are a PhD.
This course focuses more on theoretic part of survival analysis. It is good course for PhD students.
A good course if you want to get some flavors of the theory of survival analysis. Yes, I would recommend it.
Recommended if you want a refresh on theory stats
